price: Dios les hace claros sus Signos. Dios lo sabe todo, es Sabio.
arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
